SELECT t.* FROM RP_LotteryWaySaleReport t
t.date LIKE '%${month}%'
ORDER by t.date ASC

SELECT t.* FROM RP_OrderTicketReport t
t.date LIKE '%${month}%'
ORDER by t.date ASC

SELECT t.* FROM RP_OrderTicketDiffReport t
t.date LIKE '%${month}%'
ORDER by t.date ASC
SELECT sum(money) as money from DC_CP_OrderInfo where 1 = 1 and isValid=1 and ticketTime like '%${date}%' AND orderType = 1 and schemeType=1 AND status=3
SELECT sum(money) as money from DC_CP_TraceOrderInfo where 1 = 1 and isValid=1 and dtype=2 and sycDate like '%${date}%'
SELECT sum(money) as money from DC_CP_OrderInfo where 1 = 1 and isValid=1 and ticketTime like '%${date}%' AND orderType = 1 and schemeType!=1 AND status=3
SELECT sum(money) as money from DC_TicketInfo where 1 = 1 and ticketTime like '%${date}%' and castStatus in (2,3)

SELECT orderList.orderId as schemeExtendId,(orderList.money - tList.tmoney) as diffMoney, '方案相同的 金额差' as diffType, 0 as status ,#{0} as date FROM (select cporder.schemeExtendId as orderId,cporder.money from DC_CP_OrderInfo cporder WHERE cporder.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} AND cporder.orderType = 1 AND cporder.status=3 ) orderList INNER JOIN (select t.schemeExtendId as tId,sum(t.money) as tmoney FROM DC_TicketInfo t WHERE t.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} and t.castStatus in (2,3) and t.isChaseNum=0 GROUP BY t.schemeExtendId ) tList ON(orderList.orderId = tList.tId) WHERE (orderList.money - tList.tmoney) != 0 UNION
-- 方案表有，票表无单边账数据 SELECT orderList.orderId as schemeExtendId,orderList.money as diffMoney,'方案表有，票表无单边账数据' as diffType, 0 as status ,#{0} as date FROM (select cporder.schemeExtendId as orderId,cporder.money from DC_CP_OrderInfo cporder WHERE cporder.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} AND cporder.orderType = 1 AND cporder.status=3 ) orderList LEFT JOIN (select t.schemeExtendId as tId,sum(t.money) as tmoney FROM DC_TicketInfo t WHERE t.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} and t.isChaseNum=0 GROUP BY t.schemeExtendId ) tList ON(orderList.orderId = tList.tId) WHERE tList.tId is NULL

SELECT orderList.orderId as schemeExtendId,(orderList.money - tList.tmoney) as diffMoney, '方案相同的 金额差' as diffType, 0 as status ,#{0} as date FROM (select cporder.schemeExtendId as orderId,cporder.money from DC_CP_TraceOrderInfo cporder WHERE cporder.sycDate =#{2} and cporder.dtype=2 ) orderList INNER JOIN (select t.schemeExtendId as tId,sum(t.money) as tmoney FROM DC_TicketInfo t WHERE t.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} and t.castStatus in (2,3) and t.isChaseNum=1 GROUP BY t.schemeExtendId ) tList ON(orderList.orderId = tList.tId) WHERE (orderList.money - tList.tmoney) != 0 UNION
-- 方案表有，票表无单边账数据 SELECT orderList.orderId as schemeExtendId,orderList.money as diffMoney,'方案表有，票表无单边账数据' as diffType, 0 as status ,#{0} as date FROM (select cporder.schemeExtendId as orderId,cporder.money from DC_CP_TraceOrderInfo cporder WHERE cporder.sycDate = #{2} and cporder.dtype=2 ) orderList LEFT JOIN (select t.schemeExtendId as tId,sum(t.money) as tmoney FROM DC_TicketInfo t WHERE t.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} and t.isChaseNum=1 GROUP BY t.schemeExtendId ) tList ON(orderList.orderId = tList.tId) WHERE tList.tId is NULL

SELECT dc.tid as schemeExtendId,-1*dc.money as diffMoney,0 as status , diffType,#{0} as date from( SELECT tList.tId as schemeExtendId,tList.tmoney as diffMoney,'方案表无，票表有单边账数据' as diffType FROM (select cporder.schemeExtendId as orderId,cporder.money from DC_CP_OrderInfo cporder WHERE cporder.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} AND cporder.orderType = 1 ) orderList RIGHT JOIN (select t.schemeExtendId as tId,sum(t.money) as tmoney FROM DC_TicketInfo t WHERE t.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} and t.castStatus in (2,3) and t.isChaseNum=0 GROUP BY t.schemeExtendId ) tList ON(orderList.orderId = tList.tId) WHERE orderList.orderId is NULL UNION SELECT orderList.orderId as schemeExtendId,-1*tList.tmoney as diffMoney,'方案表撤单，票表出票成功' as diffType FROM (select cporder.schemeExtendId as orderId,cporder.money from DC_CP_OrderInfo cporder WHERE cporder.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} AND cporder.orderType = 1 AND cporder.status=4 ) orderList INNER JOIN (select t.schemeExtendId as tId,sum(t.money) as tmoney FROM DC_TicketInfo t WHERE t.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} and t.castStatus in (2,3) and t.isChaseNum=0 GROUP BY t.schemeExtendId ) tList ON(orderList.orderId = tList.tId))list INNER JOIN (SELECT t.voteTicketId as tid,t.money as money,t.schemeExtendId as sid FROM DC_TicketInfo t WHERE t.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} and #{1} and t.castStatus in (2,3) and t.isChaseNum=0 )dc ON (list.schemeExtendId = dc.sid)

SELECT dc.tid as schemeExtendId,-1*dc.money as diffMoney,0 as status , diffType,#{0} as date from( SELECT tList.tId as schemeExtendId,tList.tmoney as diffMoney,'方案表无，票表有单边账数据' as diffType FROM (select cporder.schemeExtendId as orderId,cporder.money from DC_CP_TraceOrderInfo cporder WHERE cporder.sycDate=#{2} ) orderList RIGHT JOIN (select t.schemeExtendId as tId,sum(t.money) as tmoney FROM DC_TicketInfo t WHERE t.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} AND #{1} and t.castStatus in (2,3) and t.isChaseNum=1 GROUP BY t.schemeExtendId ) tList ON(orderList.orderId = tList.tId) WHERE orderList.orderId is NULL UNION SELECT orderList.orderId as schemeExtendId,-1*tList.tmoney as diffMoney,'方案表撤单，票表出票成功' as diffType FROM (select cporder.schemeExtendId as orderId,cporder.money from DC_CP_TraceOrderInfo cporder WHERE cporder.sycDate=#{2} AND cporder.dtype=3 ) orderList INNER JOIN (select t.schemeExtendId as tId,sum(t.money) as tmoney FROM DC_TicketInfo t WHERE t.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} AND #{1} and t.castStatus in (2,3) and t.isChaseNum=1 GROUP BY t.schemeExtendId ) tList ON(orderList.orderId = tList.tId))list INNER JOIN (SELECT t.voteTicketId as tid,t.money as money,t.schemeExtendId as sid FROM DC_TicketInfo t WHERE t.ticketTime BETWEEN #{0} AND #{1} and t.castStatus in (2,3) and t.isChaseNum=1 )dc ON (list.schemeExtendId = dc.sid)
